content.question:
Dr. Sosa administers the first exam to all his introductory psychology students, which amounts to 250 students total. The mean for the first exam was 75%. The grades for Dr. Sosaâ€™s classes are distributed as shown below.

Dr. Sosa concludes the students in his class are achieving appropriate mastery of the material. Why is this conclusion invalid?

choices.label: Dr. Sosa should have evaluated each of his classes separately.
Dr. Sosa did not evaluate enough students.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
